prompts: Create a dashboard for FRED inflation data.
Build an AI writer tool to enhance your writing.
Develop a personal finance tracker with expense categorization.
Create a weather forecast app using public API data.
Build a social media sentiment analyzer for trending topics.
Design a task management app for remote teams.
Build a real-time chat application with messaging groups.
Create a recipe finder app based on available ingredients.
Build a habit tracker with visual progress indicators.
Design a personal learning dashboard for online courses.
